fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- In the night, create a new rule, which must be based on one of the below templates. It will be announced once the next day starts.
> Do not say the following word: [word]
> Do not target [named person] with any ability during the [Day or Night].
> Do not ping or vote for [named person].

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All rules will accumulate and last until you die.
- If you get revived, his previous rules are immediately reinstated.
- If a player other than you breaks a rule, they are hit by an attack of a tier equal to the amount of times they have broken a rule.
- If you break a rule, you are modkilled.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill at least 3 rule-breakers, other than yourself.
